D1: 
DDRA  = 0b00000011
PORTA = 0b00000001

D8: 
DDRA  = 0b00000011
PORTA = 0b00000010

D15: 
DDRA  = 0b00000101
PORTA = 0b00000001

PORTA = 0b00000100

PORTA = 0b00010000
